metadata.title: CVE-2014-3986 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
include/tests_webservers in Lynis before 1.5.5 allows local users tooverwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a /tmp/lynis.*.unsortedfile with an easily determined name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3986` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lynis - 1.5.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lynis package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.5-1').
